short_summary: Phase II EZ899-231081 - Buildings A-K, Floor Finish Replacement
description: This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify.  Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.

### Solicitation Information

This solicitation is an invitation to qualify suppliers for floor finish replacement in Buildings A to K. The tender is no longer active as of the publication of this announcement.

### Special Requirements

* Supplying services for floor laying and installation
* With accompanying documents: trade agreements, tender package, any applicable appendices

---

### Tender Conditions

* Tender evaluation criteria: lowest price
* Tendering method: competitive - selective clearing

---

### Contact Information

* Janie Leung, PSPC
* janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca 

Please note that there is no need for an automatic right of appeal. All interested parties should contact the contracting entity for more information.
